reviews.review_msg: He expects the students to do all the things before class. Prepare and give the quiz before the chapter is taught. The quizzes are too difficult because they are meant to be given after chapter is taught , but he doesn't understand that. Too conscious while teaching. Run away for your lives.
Pretty good with explaining, exam questions are similar to homework & questions he goes over, and sometimes even exact same.

Great Prof. Easily approachable for help along with being very friendly. To do good you must take wiley plus seriously and go to lectures and tutorials. Readings from the text are also important to compliment her great condensed notes.Also try questions from the chapters to practice your skills. Work hard and you will do good, and don't let the fir
